short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Features a delightful scene of Pikachu relaxing in a traditional Japanese hot spring.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy the ultimate relaxation in your browsing experience with a peaceful Pikachu soaking in a hot spring, set against a tranquil mountain landscape. This extension brings calm to your new tab, featuring shortcuts, and a real-time clock.
